name: Verify Collision Handling
description: Validates that collision detection works correctly between player, doors, and environment.
testObjective: Ensure player cannot clip through solid objects and collision behaves as expected.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.expected: Player is stopped by wall collision, cannot pass through

steps.action: Stand between a door and its button, then close the door
steps.expected: Player should be pushed aside, not clipped through the door

steps.action: Try to walk through a closed door
steps.expected: Player cannot pass through, solid collision prevents movement

steps.action: Verify camera doesn't clip into door mesh when standing close
steps.expected: Camera should maintain proper distance from surfaces

steps.action: Test collision with various objects (tables, panels, etc.)
steps.expected: All solid objects have proper collision detection

postconditions: Collision detection is consistent and reliable
